channel.title: Error on my compile.bat when I run it
channel.description:
I need help because whenever I go to compile it, and it compiles fine, but it does this when I run it (still using compiler.bat and i am using Mod Tharok's Perfect Compiler v1.9 if it helps)... it says this: [code] Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1404) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:22) at server.main(server.java:27) [/code]
Edit: no one is replying, can someone help me please? I cannot run my server or anything, ca someone help me please?
